creditline: Gift of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
description: three large, black, grey, white, and lime green angel fish at center and R edge; three greyscale fish at LL and shadow of coral; shadow of another smaller fish at LR
inscription: Left: [一九五五年作　ハワイの魚B] {1955nen saku, Hawaii no sakana}; bottom, in pencil: [Hawaiian Fishes. B] [Toshi Yoshida]
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
title: Hawaiian Fishes B
